task.title: Remove Participant
task.shortdesc: Remove participants from a particular session.

step.cmd: Select an existing participant's name and press Delete or Backspace.
step.stepresult: A Delete participant dialog will appear asking you to confirm that you would like to delete the participant.

step.cmd: If you are unsure click No. To continue and delete the participant, click Yes.
step.stepresult: The participant will no longer appear in your participants list in the Session Information view. Records previously associated with the deleted participant will now have an unspecified participant field.
